SEARCH
Package pegasus.grid

Class DoubleArrayGrid

java.lang.Object
pegasus.grid.DoubleArrayGrid
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Iterable<Double>, BaseGrid<Double>, DoubleGrid, BinaryIndexedDoubleIterable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Matrix
public class DoubleArrayGrid extends Object implements DoubleGrid
An array-based double grid.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • DoubleArrayGrid

      public DoubleArrayGrid(int rows, int columns)
      Creates a new array grid.
      Parameters:
      rows - The number of rows to initialize
      columns - The number of columns to initialize
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - When the dimensions are invalid

    • DoubleArrayGrid

      public DoubleArrayGrid(int rows, int columns, IntToDoubleBiFunction generator)
      Creates a new array grid.
      Parameters:
      rows - The number of rows to initialize
      columns - The number of columns to initialize
      generator - The generator function to initialize this grid with
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - When the dimensions are invalid
      NullPointerException - When the provided generator function is null

    • DoubleArrayGrid

      public DoubleArrayGrid(DoubleGrid g)
      Creates a new array grid.
      Parameters:
      g - The grid of which to copy elements from
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided grid g is null

    • DoubleArrayGrid

      public DoubleArrayGrid(DoubleGrid g, int r1, int c1, int r2, int c2)
      Creates a new array grid.
      Parameters:
      g - The grid of which to copy elements from
      r1 - The starting row index at which to start copying values from (inclusive)
      c1 - The starting column index at which to start copying values from (inclusive)
      r2 - The ending row index at which to stop copying values from (exclusive)
      c2 - The ending column index at which to stop copying values from (exclusive)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - When the range produces negative area
      NullPointerException - When the provided grid g is null
      BinaryIndexOutOfBoundsException - When the range is larger than the provided grid g's dimensions

    • merge

      public DoubleGrid merge(DoubleGrid g, DoubleBinaryOperator merger) throws IncompatibleDimensionsException
      Applies the provided merger function to each corresponding pair of elements between this grid and the provided grid g, then returns a new grid whose elements are populated from that of the return values of the provided merger function.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      g - The grid of which to merge this grid with

      Returns:
      The resulting grid
      Throws:
      IncompatibleDimensionsException - When the grids' dimensions are different
      NullPointerException - When either the provided grid g or the merger function is null
